results.title: Comparing the Influences of Metformin and Berberine on the Intestinal Microbiota of Rats With Nonalcoholic Steatohepatitis.
results.text_hl: Model rats were fed high-fat diets to create @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@ models. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@BER@@@ rats were administrated @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@BER@@@, respectively, at the onset of induction of @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@.

results.title: Real-world management of non-alcoholic steatohepatitis differs from clinical practice guideline recommendations and across regions
results.text_hl: Two-thirds of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were receiving off-label treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@ or associated underlying conditions with the aim of improving @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@, most commonly statins, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_E @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014810 @@@vitamin E

results.title: A Canadian survey on knowledge of non-alcoholic fatty liver disease among physicians.
results.text_hl: Finally, more than 40% of PCPs, 22% of specialists, and 33% of nurses thought that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and statin were treatments for @<m>DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@.
